body.p: In particular, the request was for the Interpretations Committee to clarify how an entity should account for levies when the calculation for the levies is based on financial data that relates to a period before the period that contains the activity that triggers the payment of the levy. This is the case if, for example, the activity that triggers the payment of the levy, as identified by the legislation, occurs in 20X1 and the calculation of the levy is based on financial data for 20X0 (see Illustrative Example 2).
